A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Total garbage. This entire movie was a waste of everything. 

The plot goes absolutely nowhere\, the character motivations don't make any sense\, and Rian Johnson is far too preoccupied with "subverting our expectations" to bother making a good movie. The fact that this movie has a 91% rating (somehow) is the sole reason I created an account on this site... 

Whether you have never heard of Star Wars\, or you're the world's biggest Star Wars fan\, this movie is not worth watching.
